pages.text: $(li)Frogs are passive creatures that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/swamp/swamp)Swamps$(/l).$(br)$(li)These creatures can be bred giving them $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/spider_eye)Spider Eyes$(/l) or any kind o Fish.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/quark/frog_leg)Frog Legs$(/l) on death.
